Texts.Chs: 下一步：^orange;矿物样本^reset;。你可以在化学操作台里制作它。就如同DNA样本一样，这也是你实验中需要到的重要物质。
Texts.Eng: Next up: ^orange;Mineral Samples^reset;. Make some in your ^orange;Chemistry Lab^reset;. Like DNA samples they are ^green;essential^reset; in lab use.

Texts.Chs: 随着你成功制作出了矿物样本和DNA样本后，你已经进入了一片新的领域。我建议你应该升级到^orange;生化实验室^reset;，以应付更为复杂的研究！
Texts.Eng: With mineral and DNA samples in your possession you've opened up a whole new world of research and possibility. Now you should upgrade to a ^orange;Bio-Chem Lab^reset; for even more advanced research!
